q_content: In your view, how often do the following things occur in this country’s elections: Votes are counted fairly?
option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

q_content: In your view, how often do the following things occur in this country’s elections: TV news favors the governing party?
option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

q_content: In your view, how often do the following things occur in this country’s elections: Voters are bribed?
option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

q_content: In your view, how often do the following things occur in this country’s elections: Journalists provide fair coverage of elections?
option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

q_content: In your view, how often do the following things occur in this country’s elections: Election officials are fair?
option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

q_content: In your view, how often do the following things occur in this country’s elections: Rich people buy elections?
option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

q_content: In your view, how often do the following things occur in this country’s elections: Women have equal opportunities to run the office?
option: 1. Very often 3. Not often 4. Not at all

q_content: How important is politics in your life?
option: 1. Very important 3. Not very important 4. Not at all important

q_content: Men make better political leaders than women do
option: 1. Agree 3. Disagree

q_content: In terms of the effects of immigration on the development of your country, do you agree with: Gives asylum to political refugees who are persecuted elsewhere?
option: 1. Agree 2. Neither agree nor disagree 3. Disagree

q_content: When you get together with your friends, would you say you discuss political matters frequently, occasionally, or never?
option: 1. Very Frequently 2. Occasionally 3. Never

q_content: How democratically is this country being governed today?
option: 1. Completely disagree 2. Completely agree

q_content: How satisfied are you with how the political system is functioning in your country these days?
option: 1. Completely disagree 2. Completely agree

q_content: How much would you say the political system in your country allows people like you to have a say in what the government does?
option: 1. Completely disagree 2. Completely agree

q_content: Having a strong leader who does not have to bother with parliament and elections
option: 1. Very good 4. Very bad

q_content: Having experts, not government, make decisions according to what they think is best for the country
option: 1. Very good 4. Very bad

q_content: Having a system governed by religious law in which there are no political parties or elections
option: 1. Very good 4. Very bad

q_content: I am usually cautious about trusting politicians
option: 1. Agree 2. Disagree

q_content: In general, the government usually does the right thing
option: 1. Agree 2. Disagree

q_content: Most politicians are honest and truthful
option: 1. Agree 2. Disagree

q_content: People in the government often show poor judgment
option: 1. Agree 2. Disagree
